item.title: Why Trump's tariffs won't push China and Europe closer
item.description: China and the European Union are unlikely to become close allies even as relations between the EU and the White House could sour.

item.title: Judge orders daily updates from Trump admin on getting Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia was deported from the United States last month as the result of what prosecutors say was an administrative error.

item.title: Luigi Mangione defense asks judge to block death penalty in CEO murder case
item.description: Mangione is charged with fatally shooting UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson on a New York City street in December.

item.title: Trump says 5 more law firms will provide $600 million total in free legal work for causes he supports
